actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction for funeral expenses paid by the spouse or other relative of the decedent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the spouse or relative of a decedent an income tax deduction for the decedent's funeral expenses, if such expenses are not claimed as an estate tax deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a deduction for funeral expenses paid by the spouse or other relative of the decedent.
